
snap(0,0,40)

sky(217,241,255)
fog(206,225,255) 
ground(205,207,226)


fadefrom(7000)

name(Paninaro| Caninaro| Let's fly!)

nlaps(4)

set(30,0,0,250,0)p
set(30,0,5600,250,0)p
set(30,0,11200,250,0)p
set(30,0,16000,250,0)p
set(51,0,20109,250,0)pr
set(43,0,21789,250,180)p
set(43,0,31411,250,0)p
set(50,0,33091,250,180)p
set(30,0,39200,250,0)p
set(30,0,44800,250,0)p
set(30,0,50400,250,0)
chk(60,0,50400,250,0)
set(34,0,54950,250,-90)pt
set(30,-4550,54950,250,90)p
set(30,-10150,54950,250,90)p
set(30,-15750,54950,250,90)p
set(30,-21350,54950,250,90)p
chk(60,-23100,54950,250,90)
set(34,-25900,54950,250,90)pt
set(30,-25900,59500,250,0)p
set(30,-25900,65100,250,0)p
set(30,-25900,70700,250,0)p
set(34,-25900,75250,250,0)pt
set(30,-21350,75250,250,90)
chk(60,-21350,75250,250,90)
set(34,-16800,75250,250,-90)pt
set(30,-16800,70700,250,180)p
set(30,-16800,65100,250,0)
set(43,-16800,58000,250,0)
set(51,-16800,58991,250,180)pr

set(43,-16800,51900,250,180)
set(30,-16800,47950,250,180)p
set(51,-16800,50909,250,0)p

set(30,-16800,42350,250,0)p
set(30,-16800,36750,250,0)p
set(30,-16800,31150,250,0)p
chk(60,-16800,28350,250,0)
set(34,-16800,26600,250,90)pt

set(40,-12250,26600,250,90)p
set(35,-6650,26600,250,90)p
set(35,-1050,26600,250,90)
set(55,-3800,26600,250,90)pr
fix(61,-1200,26600,-1000,90)s
set(35,4550,26600,250,90)p
set(37,9100,26600,250,-90)pt
set(40,9100,22050,250,180)p
set(43,9100,14000,250,180)
set(51,9100,15941,250,180)pr

set(30,9100,11200,250,180)p
set(30,9100,5600,250,180)p
set(30,9100,0,250,180)p
chk(60,9100,-2800,250,0)
set(34,9100,-4550,250,180)pt
set(30,4550,-4550,250,90)p
set(34,0,-4550,250,90)pt


maxr(19,14000,-7000)
maxb(9,-9400,-26800)
maxl(19,-29200,-7000)
maxt(9,81800,-26800)
